item.description:
This meetup is our second in a series of monthly "Show & Tell" meetups for you to show your work, be it in a portfolio, hanging on your ear lobes, on a laptop or the web.

If music is your shtick, I'll work on a future meetup where you can bring your instrument or play through speakers, most likely when the weather is warmer.

Please RSVP, I will need a head count so I know if we will need to hold extra tables.

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "meetup" sign on the table
item.why: Looking at others work is a great way to get to know other members with similar or complementary creative passions to your own.
item.name: Creative "Show & Tell"
